title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the quantity demanded will decrease by 8.5%.
The response states that the quantity demanded will decrease by 8.5%.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not explain that consumers have more substitutes for the good in the long run that are not available in the short run or there is more time to adjust in the long run.
The response explains that consumers have more substitutes for the good in the long run that are not available in the short run or there is more time to adjust in the long run.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that that total revenue will decrease and/or does not explain that demand is more elastic in the long run ( 3.2 > 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaae4maiaab6 cacaqGYaGaaeiiaiaab6dacaqGGaGaaeymaaaa@3ACD@ ) so the percentage decrease in quantity will be larger than the percentage increase in price.

The response states that total revenue will decrease, and explains that demand is more elastic in the long run ( 3.2 > 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaae4maiaab6 cacaqGYaGaaeiiaiaab6dacaqGGaGaaeymaaaa@3ACD@ ) so the percentage decrease in quantity will be larger than the percentage increase in price.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that movie tickets are a normal good and/or does not explain that a normal good is a good with a positive income elasticity of demand ( 0.75 > 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeimaiaab6 cacaqG3aGaaeynaiaabccacaqG+aGaaeiiaiaabcdaaaa@3B86@ ).

The response states that movie tickets are a normal good and explains that a normal good is a good with a positive income elasticity of demand ( 0.75 > 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeimaiaab6 cacaqG3aGaaeynaiaabccacaqG+aGaaeiiaiaabcdaaaa@3B86@ ).

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include a correctly labeled graph showing a leftward shift of the demand curve (see below).
The response includes a correctly labeled graph showing a leftward shift of the demand curve (see below).
